response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize your industry. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and efficiency, setting new standards in its field. Given its unique features and market positioning, it's valued at $15,000 to us. We're offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your potential to maximize the product's impact. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your business with cutting-edge technology.", "product_price": 12000}
